channel.title: Autocasting
channel.description: How do i get autocasting ancient spells to work with Ancient Staff?

item.title: Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @muhascape_owner muhascape owner
item.description:
@muhascape_owner wrote:

lol mine does do that and i made tut and my ice barrage works on my server so fix up ur ids then itll work properly

Read full topic

item.title: Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

[quote=“muhascape owner, post:4, topic:116653”]fine ill send[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 03:24:01 AM[/size][hr]find
and press enter after {
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add this for ice burst (master wand)

public void IceBurst(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(17); inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(363, 22, 10); actionTimer = 1; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

for ice barrage (ancient staff)

add

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 30, 10); actionTimer = 0; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

then find public int getwepanim()

then add this for ice burst

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914) // Master Wand
{
IceBurst();
}

for ice barrage

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // Ancient Staff { IceBarrage(); }[/quote]
give credits to rune-server.
and that is crap auto caster
just attack a normal weapon
make a anim that shows you hand in the air like real ice barrage.

Read full topic

item.title: Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @muhascape_owner muhascape owner
item.description:
@muhascape_owner wrote:

fine ill send[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 03:24:01 AM[/size][hr]find
and press enter after {
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add this for ice burst (master wand)

public void IceBurst(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(17); inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(363, 22, 10); actionTimer = 1; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

for ice barrage (ancient staff)

add

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 30, 10); actionTimer = 0; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

then find public int getwepanim()

then add this for ice burst

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914) // Master Wand
{
IceBurst();
}

for ice barrage

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // Ancient Staff { IceBarrage(); }
